Posts.EditableText:
Hello!
I want to tell you about my text adventire for Android called Impossible Quest.

[url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.impossiblequest.two:2m5w9g3k]Link on Google Play[/url:2m5w9g3k]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=632128980:2m5w9g3k]The game is also on Steam Greenlight, I would really appreciate your votes![/url:2m5w9g3k]

[b:2m5w9g3k]Impossible Quest[/b:2m5w9g3k] is a story of a very troubled man. He can't live a day without getting into some trouble. Your job is to help him and keep him alive.

[b:2m5w9g3k]Features:[/b:2m5w9g3k]
[list:2m5w9g3k] [*:2m5w9g3k]Right now there are 3 quests with different settings:
[b:2m5w9g3k]Deadly Danger Dungeon[/b:2m5w9g3k] - you wander through a very strange dungeon and lots of weird stuff happens to you.
[b:2m5w9g3k]Global Adventure[/b:2m5w9g3k] - adventures all around the world!
[b:2m5w9g3k]Impossible Quest... in space![/b:2m5w9g3k] - title says it all.
I am planning on making more!
 [/*:m:2m5w9g3k][*:2m5w9g3k]2 languages: Russian and English!
 [/*:m:2m5w9g3k][*:2m5w9g3k]More than 100 endings! Not even kidding.
 [/*:m:2m5w9g3k][*:2m5w9g3k]More than a million bits of text!
 [/*:m:2m5w9g3k][*:2m5w9g3k]Awesome* humor![/*:m:2m5w9g3k][/list:u:2m5w9g3k]


*In creator's opinion.
Posts.HTML:
Hello!
I want to tell you about my text adventire for Android called Impossible Quest.

Link on Google Play

The game is also on Steam Greenlight, I would really appreciate your votes!

Impossible Quest is a story of a very troubled man. He can't live a day without getting into some trouble. Your job is to help him and keep him alive.

Features:
[list] [*]Right now there are 3 quests with different settings:
Deadly Danger Dungeon - you wander through a very strange dungeon and lots of weird stuff happens to you.
Global Adventure - adventures all around the world!
Impossible Quest... in space! - title says it all.
I am planning on making more!
[/*:m][*]2 languages: Russian and English!
[/*:m][*]More than 100 endings! Not even kidding.
[/*:m][*]More than a million bits of text!
[/*:m][*]Awesome* humor![/*:m][/list:u]


*In creator's opinion.
